text: The King of Paris () is a 1917 Russian silent drama movie directed by Yevgeni Bauer.Король ПарижаВ кинотеатре "Звезда" бесплатно покажут немое кино 1917 года It stars Vyacheslav Svoboda, Nikolai Radin, and Emma Bauer. ==Actors== *Vjacheslav Svoboda as Roger "King of Paris" *Nikolai Radin as Rascol Venkov *Emma Bauer as Furstin Von Dorstein *Mikhail Stalski as Jean Hiénard *Lydia Koreneva as Lucienne Marechal *Marija Boldireva as Juliette == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:Russian silent movies Category:1917 drama movies Category:Movies directed by Yevgeni Bauer
title: The King of Paris (1917 movie)
